name: UAnimBoneCompressionCodec_ACLCustom
doc: Uses the open source Animation Compression Library with custom settings suitable for debugging purposes.

OptimizationTargets: The skeletal meshes used to estimate the skinning deformation during compression.
KeyframeStrippingProportion: The minimum proportion of keyframes that should be stripped.
KeyframeStrippingThreshold: The error threshold below which to strip keyframes. If a keyframe can be reconstructed with an error below the threshold, it is stripped.
